welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Miyanaga, a charming city known for its tranquil gardens and rich cultural heritage. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the hidden gems this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fukuoka Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights, mainly by low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network by selecting 'FUK Airport Free WiFi' and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kita Kyushu Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kita Kyushu Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
